content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you like the apartment. I'm always looking for reliable tenants who appreciate the comfort and convenience of my properties. Let's start the negotiation. What is your proposed rental price for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is really nice, but as a student, I'm on a tight budget. I propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your honesty, Yi-Nuo. However, I must admit that 800 Euros is quite low considering the prime location and the quality of the apartment. I am willing to negotiate, but I am looking for a price that truly reflects the value of this property. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. Considering the quality of the apartment, I propose an increase of 100 euros, making it 900 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your second proposal, Yi-Nuo. While 900 Euros is closer to my expectations, I believe the apartment's value justifies a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, considering the apartment's quality and location, I propose 950 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your proposal is getting closer, Yi-Nuo. However, I still believe that the apartment's value justifies a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your perspective. I propose 1000 euros per month as a fair rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your patience, Yi-Nuo. I believe 1000 Euros is a fair price for this apartment, given its quality and prime location. I agree to the price of 1000 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1000] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1000] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo. I'm glad we reached an agreement. The rental price is 1000 euros per month. If you have any questions or concerns, please let me know. Otherwise, I'll prepare the lease agreement for you to sign.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I have no further questions at the moment. I'm looking forward to receiving the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo. I'll prepare the lease agreement as soon as possible. If there are no more concerns, we can terminate the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
